H0.text: Two sticks being rubbed together absorb heat energy.

H1.text: A piece of wood burning absorbs heat energy.

H2.text: Steel wool rusting absorbs heat energy.

H3.text: Ice cubes melting absorb heat energy.

A4.text: An endothermic process is a chemical or physical process that absorbs heat from its surroundings.

A5.text: The melting of ice cubes is an example of an endothermic process.
